title: Introduction
content:
Chapter 1 Algorithmic Composition Algorithm is:
 A set of mathematical instructions that must be followed in a fixed order, and that, especially if given to a computer, will help to calculate an answer to a mathematical problem. A systematic procedure that produces â€“ in a finite number of steps the answer to a question or the solution of a problem. [...] (especially computing) a set of rules that must be followed when solving a particular problem. (Nierhaus 2009 p.2)
